class PropertyLoader
extends Object

Responsible for loading and traversing the logging properties file data.


Author:
Ralf Siegel

Method Summary

public
read ( file: String, propHandler: PropertyHandler, logManager: LogManager ): Void
Read the given logging property xml file and travers the data. Inform the LogManager when done.


Method Documentation

read

public function read(file: String,
 propHandler: PropertyHandler,
 logManager: LogManager): Void
Read the given logging property xml file and travers the data. Inform the LogManager when done.

Parameters:
file
the logging.xml
propHandler
a reference to the property handler object
logManager
a reference to the global LogManager
